text: Ana-Maria Avram (12 September 1961 â€“ 1 August 2017) was a Romanian composer. Her works deal with the spectral music style. She represents with Iancu Dumitrescu the Hyper-Spectral trend in contemporary avant-garde music, conductor with Dumitrescu of the Hyperion Ensemble. She has composed around 90 works as of 2009: music for soloists, chamber music, music for orchestra, electronic music and computer-assisted music. She was born in Bucharest. Avram died on 1 August 2017 at the age of 55.RIP: Ana-Maria Avram, hyper-spectral composer and co-conductor of Hyperion Ensemble with Iancu Dumitrescu ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography, interviews and catalogue of works * SpectrumXXI international festival dedicated to spectral music initiated by Ana-maria Avram and Iancu Dumitrescu * Biography and pressbook * An interview Category:1961 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Romanian composers Category:People from Bucharest
title: Ana-Maria Avram
